name: mylottery
0:
”Alexa, start My Lottery and add a new field for PowerBall”
”Alexa, ask My Lottery if I won in the last drawing of MegaMillions”
”Alexa, ask My Lottery for the latest drawn numbers of PowerBall”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my lottery
des:
Start My Lottery to store your own lottery numbers!
You can ask My Lottery if you did win in the last drawing and you will get the result and amount you won as answer.

You are playing more than one lottery field?
No Problem! You can add multiple fields with the command "add a new field for ...".

it is always important to tell the skill for wich lottery the command should be processed.
Currently, the following lotteries are supported:
Powerball, MegaMillions, German Lotto with Game77 and Super7, EuroJackpot, EuroMillions and Austrian Lotto with it`s Joker

These are some example commands:
1. add a new field for PowerBall
2. what are the numbers in the last drawing of MegaMillions
3. what is the current jackpot for EuroJackpot
4. did I win in PowerBall
5. when is the next drawing of EuroMillions
6. what are my currently stored numbers for MegaMillions
7. delete my numbers for German Lotto

Questions, feedback, issues or enhancement ideas can be reported to:
MeinLottoAlexa@gmail.com

Enjoy the skill!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
